name: Super Square (curioustea)
description:
Keep up the Heat.  Spin and Flip  to Meet Each and Every  SQUARE BEAT.

Press Up For Blue and Down for red. Use A and D to tilt left and right.  

The Idea was originally for GeoJam 2021 but didn't submit in time. Instead I've adapted it for RhythmJam! Might work on it some more if people like it. I only started GeoJam in the last ten hours so technically I made this whole thing during Rhythm Jam.
